storyInfo: Zuo Le visits Dahuang on official business. Shu, the proxy living in the city, seems to be a difficult customer. Troubles in the fields gives Zuo Le a headache, but also a chance to make a few friends.

attributes.content: Three months ago...
What? The broken line is the man line, not the earth line? So it's an addled brain I'll need to worry about? Not some illness?
attributes.name: Surprised Farmer

attributes.content: Ha, told you that walnut tree was planted for you. Go give it some fertilizer before it's too late!
attributes.name: Happy Farmer

attributes.content: I wouldn't say that. The broken line just means you'll face a difficult decision around the age of twenty.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: But who gets to walk a path without a few twists and turns? Just let it be. The line runs much smoother after that, doesn't it?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: That's right on the mark!
attributes.name: Surprised Farmer

attributes.content: My family farm was ruined by Catastrophe when I was twenty-three. I didn't know how I could make a living in the city.
attributes.name: Surprised Farmer

attributes.content: But I've done well enough for myself, coming with the rest of the folk to Dahuang to study agriculture and keeping in my old occupation.
attributes.name: Surprised Farmer

attributes.content: Wow...
attributes.name: Happy Farmer

attributes.content: No one can predict fate. It's only a justification for what happened.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: I've heard about the wonders of the Tianshis, but I didn't expect you to know so much...
attributes.name: Surprised Farmer

attributes.content: A young girl like you is already a Shouye Tianshi at your age, Shu?
attributes.name: Surprised Farmer

attributes.content: We all gain wisdom at our own pace. I simply pass on the knowledge that I learned sooner than others.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Remarkable, remarkable. Say...
attributes.name: Happy Farmer

attributes.content: That young man over there has been staring at you for a while... do you know him?
attributes.name: Happy Farmer

attributes.content: Ah...
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: A guest. Sorry, we'll talk another time.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Zuo Le, Candleholder of the Sui Regulator, here to review the development of Dahuang and matters relating to the Sui.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: There are no restrictions on your daily activities, but I ask that you refrain from leaving Dahuang for the time being.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Your cooperation is much appreciated, Madam Shu.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Ah, so you're the new Candleholder I've heard so much about.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: This is just a customary review. It will not get in the way of your agricultural research. Feel free to go about your business as usual—
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You're young. Do you even count as an adult yet?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: This place is pretty far out in the middle of nowhere. Did your journey go well? Any trouble with bandits?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: A few bandits are no trouble for me.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Regarding work on the Twelve Pagodas and Five Cities, the Sui Regulator hopes that you will cooperate with the Ministry of Engineering to advance the project smoothly, and that you will maintain a cordial relationship with the Tianshi Bureaus.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: In addition, there are some matters that require...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Oh, you can walk through the fields if you want, as long as you don't step on the crops, but you should give the Tianshis a heads up if you want to visit the factory.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: I understand the scope of my work, Madam Shu. I still have...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: That's the house the last Candleholder used. It's been refurnished and ready for use.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: That's all. Any questions?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Er... no.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Good. I have a lot to do in the fields, so I'll take my leave.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Just ask around if you need any help. People here are very friendly to visitors.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Wei!
attributes.name: Mischievous Girl

attributes.content: Wei!
attributes.name: Mischievous Girl

attributes.content: Excuse me, I'm on official business—
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Here.
attributes.name: Mischievous Girl

attributes.content: What's this? A lunchbox?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You're hungry, aren't you?
attributes.name: Mischievous Girl

attributes.content: You've been standing there all day like a scarecrow. Do you even know how to get food on your own?
attributes.name: Mischievous Girl

attributes.content: Oh... er, duoxie.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You like it?
attributes.name: Mischievous Girl

attributes.content: Yes, it's very good...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You're just gonna eat without doing any work?
attributes.name: Mischievous Girl

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*...!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Mind your manners, Grain Buds. This gentleman is a guest.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: But you said everyone in Dahuang needs to sweat in the fields before they eat.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: This strange boy says he's on official business, but he's not working the fields or building houses. What's he here for?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: He has his own job to do.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: What, like, staring?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Yes, just staring.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: ...Ahem.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Is there... something I can help with?
attributes.name: Zuo Le
Shu
attributes.content: Let me think...

attributes.name: Shu
attributes.content: Do you know how to work a planting machine?
No...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I didn't think so. You don't deal with farming equipment in your line of work.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: This little cube is a six-phase monitor. Use it to place pylons at appropriate locations in the fields, and we'll be able to monitor conditions zone by zone. Can you use it?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: I've never touched anything like it before...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Feeding stockbeasts...?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Pfft—
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Well, if you're going to be here for a while, perhaps you could learn how to do farmwork.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: You could start by clearing the weeds.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Is that you, Laoshi? I—
attributes.name: Nongye Tianshi Apprentice

attributes.content: Good timing, Xiaohe.
attributes.name: Shu
Shu
attributes.content: This is...

attributes.name: Shu
attributes.content: ...a distant cousin of mine from the capital. He came to see Dahuang.
My student, He Sheng. He'll teach you.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Huh...?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Is this where the positioning device says the stockbeast is?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Yeah! When I blow this whistle, Mianmian will know I'm looking for him and come out.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Positioning device?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: There's one on every stockbeast in Dahuang. They're not very precise, but they give us an idea of their rough location.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Every single one? There must be thousands of stockbeasts in Dahuang.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Well, we've had a lot of stray stockbeasts. The ones that the older students kept for research had a tendency to elope—
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I'm sorry, I'm not familiar with such things.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Why did you join the army if you're a relative of Laoshi's?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: No important reason, really.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Is your family all mandarins?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Why do you ask?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The way you talk, and the manner you carry yourself in general.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Not a lot of people your age around here like that, except for a few blue-blood families.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I mean no offense.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I didn't say you offended anyone.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Weird, why isn't he coming out?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Mianmian had a fight with Xiaobiar a few days ago. Is that why he ran away?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Did he get pulled in by a female again?
attributes.name: He Sheng
Grain Buds
attributes.content: What?

attributes.name: Grain Buds
attributes.content: But he likes Xiaobiar! They're always together when I take them out to the mud pond.
Not like that, Candlestick!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: C-Candlestick?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I'll draw a picture of him. Memorize it, and we'll split up to look for him!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Uh... it's, er, a very good drawing...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Are you serious? I, after all the time I spent caring for the stockbeast, can barely tell it's Mianmian.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Four legs and some spots. What's so hard?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Have you ever seen a stockbeast, Candlestick?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Not often...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: It's okay. You haven't seen stockbeasts, I haven't seen nomadic cities. We've all got things we've never seen before.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Have you never been outside—to other cities?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: No, but I heard about them from Xiaohe.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: The rice that we produce each year is sent outside. They're developing new crops so the people outside can have lots to eat.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: You'll have plenty of chances.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: No rush. I like this place.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Oh yeah, take a whiff of this.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Alcohol?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Rice wine soup, my favorite snack! See where the steam's rising? That's the brewery. We could stop by on our way.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: So there are breweries here.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Part of the harvest is saved for brewing. The oldest batch is more than a hundred years old.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Do you drink?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I did, once, try wine made from maize leaves. It was a gift from a farmer on a mission. It had a very strong taste; almost made me gag.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: He said it would warm us up, but we didn't expect it to be like that. He said they barely had enough to eat and didn't have the luxury of brewing with grain.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: People out there still don't have enough to eat?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: The land is vast. There are big differences between regions.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I hear something... over there?
attributes.name: Zuo Le
Grain Buds
attributes.content: Wow, Candlestick, you sure can jump!

attributes.name: Grain Buds
attributes.content: We'll find Mianmian soon enough!
Our drones can fly higher than that, and we have the positioning device to help us.
attributes.name: He Sheng
He Sheng
attributes.content: No need to—

attributes.name: He Sheng
attributes.content: Wait, over there...
A fire?!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Three months?
attributes.name: Assistant Minister of Engineering

attributes.content: Three months. This project is no small thing, and every segment needs time to ensure there are no problems. Three months is already on the optimistic side.
attributes.name: Veteran Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: 'Twelve Pagodas and Five Cities' isn't just a poetic quote. You know how long the... 'prototype' has simmered in the minds of the Tianshis, from generation to generation.
attributes.name: Veteran Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: Of course. The first step is always the hardest.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister of Engineering

attributes.content: Though I am but a humble paper-pusher, I've had the honor to study at the Tianshi Bureaus myself. My command of the Arts is a far cry from the masters in the room, of course, but I'm hardly content with sitting behind a desk and drinking tea while staring at my Tianshi apparatus.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister of Engineering

attributes.content: Three months. That was how long it took us up in the north, in heavy wind and snow.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister of Engineering

attributes.content: Think carefully and give me an answer. How long will it take to finish the assembly of the last two plates of Dahuang's core section?
attributes.name: Assistant Minister of Engineering

attributes.content: Maybe a little more than a month, given enough energy and supplies...
attributes.name: Veteran Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: There's no need to worry about energy. I have already given instructions for the supplies. Your only concern is the project's progress.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister of Engineering

attributes.content: At such a distance, simply transporting supplies is a massive undertaking. Every day delayed represents a huge expenditure of money and resources.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister of Engineering

attributes.content: There is no place for complacency, for the sake of the people and the hard-earned taxes they pay.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister of Engineering

attributes.content: We are in the sixth month of the year now. I sincerely hope you will be reunited with your families by Mid-Autumn.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister of Engineering

attributes.content: Sigh.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister of Engineering

attributes.content: Sometimes you just have to ruffle the feathers a little. I'm sorry you had to see that.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister of Engineering

attributes.content: Three months, in the north. You were talking about the Danyan project.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: The city was closed due to heavy snow. The imperial court decided to put things on hold until conditions improved, but when the Messenger arrived...
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: ...He found that the Tianshi in command had rammed the frozen Originium layer open with a segment of the city, rescuing tens of thousands of villagers who were trapped by wintry conditions.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: The textbooks still celebrate the story, the event that took you to the position you hold today, Minister Wan. There was no need to be so humble.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: You flatter me. I'm simply an engineer who worked his way slowly up the Tianshi ranks. It's not my place to hold my nose in the air.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister of Engineering

attributes.content: But bringing this up is what it takes to get a bunch of stressed and overworked Tianshis to listen to me.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister of Engineering

attributes.content: Seems like you're confident that construction of the Twelve Pagodas and Five Cities will progress smoothly.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: Even if I'm confident, everything has been so rushed.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: There can be flaws in the best-laid plans. I will be counting on your backup, in that case, Assistant Minister Ning.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: That's what I'm here for.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: Now, you've only just arrived in Dahuang. I assume you're not familiar with the place yet.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: It may not be as prosperous as the heartland, but it is rich with gifts from the earth. The many delicacies made from local produce are a delight.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: Have you had the chance to try the local Wu Dou Porridge porridge, for example?
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: I'm afraid not.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: Dahuang's Wu Dou Zhou is one-of-a-kind. The five beans, Wu Dou, are red, black, mung, soy, and white.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: They complement each other, but it is the local rice that truly makes the Dahuang Wu Dou Porridge stand out.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: The wonderful fragrance and rich flavor of Dahuang rice elevate an ordinary bowl of porridge to the symbol of Dahuang's culinary culture.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: The five beans each have their own flavor, but it is the rice that makes or breaks the dish. Cooking it is, therefore, far more than just dumping the ingredients into a pot and lighting the stove.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: Heat control is the key. The five beans must not be allowed to usurp the rice at center stage, else it becomes just an ordinary bowl of grain porridge.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: You really must try it, when you have the time.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: I will.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: On another note, how is High Minister Ning?
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: Grandfather is getting on in age, but he has been fortunate to avoid major illness.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: Nevertheless, I hope he will be mindful of his health. Perhaps I should bring a little token when I report back to Baizao?
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: The thought will suffice.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: Given Dahuang's ties to the Sui, I expect I will have plenty of dealings with the Sui Regulator and the Ministry of Rites.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: I have long been in awe of High Minister Ning's achievements, but age spares none of us... it would be better for the High Minister to be less involved in particular matters.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: If my presence here in Dahuang is unwelcome, I can certainly submit a letter to the Grand Tutor immediately.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: You misunderstand. I only meant that the Ning family must be delighted you have risen to the post of Assistant Minister at such a young age, and that your grandfather must have taught you well—
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: Assistant Minister Wan.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: If you simply intend to say, 'The young and inexperienced Ning Ciqiu is not fit to work with the legendary Tianshi of Danyan,' you'll hear no argument from me.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: But as long as we're working with one another, if you have something to say, just say it.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: Stop thinking yourself clever by beating around the bush. A truly clever man would be much more amicable than you.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: I will take my leave.
attributes.name: Ning Ciqiu

attributes.content: Water, water! Good thing the fire just started and right by the river...
attributes.name: Nongye Tianshi Apprentice

attributes.content: Why did you start a fire by the forest?!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Arson is a serious crime!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I didn't do it on purpose! The fowlbeast that was another student's project ate my project!
attributes.name: Nongye Tianshi Apprentice

attributes.content: All it left was an egg! I'll get my revenge by cooking the egg!
attributes.name: Nongye Tianshi Apprentice

attributes.content: No, not revenge... I'll cook the egg in memory of my lost project! *sob*...
attributes.name: Nongye Tianshi Apprentice

attributes.content: Enough of that crap! The fire's starting to spread! Stomp it out!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: I have a hoe! We can make a control line while the winds are calm!
attributes.name: Nongye Tianshi Apprentice

attributes.content: I'll clear away any vegetation in the back and stop the fire from spreading that way!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: *pant*...
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Nongye Tianshi Apprentice

attributes.content: Oink...
attributes.name: Stray Stockbeast

attributes.content: ...Mianmian?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Oink!
attributes.name: Mianmian

attributes.content: Found you!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: What are you doing here? (Whisper) Hey, tell me, do you like Xiaobiar or not?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Where did Zuo Le go? He said he was going to clear the vegetation. But I don't see him anywhere.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Did he... lose his way?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Oink...
attributes.name: Mianmian

attributes.content: ...Should we look for him?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Oink...
attributes.name: Mianmian

attributes.content: Zuo—
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I'm right here. I didn't find... uh... Mianmian, but I did find this pair in a nest.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Zuo Le is carrying two stockbeast foals in his robes. They are so young that they have yet to open their eyes.
You shouldn't have brought back foals so young.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I shouldn't?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: But I checked the area and the mother was nowhere to be found. They wouldn't have survived for long if left to their own devices.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Isn't it better to bring them back so they could survive under your supervision?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: We're not supervisors, we're friends! We help each other out.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: They give us wool, we give them tasty hay, chase away bugs, and scratch their itches.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: We don't know if they're carrying any diseases, or if they can be domesticated. Plus...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: But they've got his scent on them. The mother wouldn't have them, even if she came back.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: That's why he shouldn't have touched them.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Well, he already did, so we need to take care of them.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Why do you keep standing up for him? He's clearly in the wrong. He doesn't know anything.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I'm doing this because he doesn't know anything!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Never mind. I'll go back and ask the teachers what to do with the little guys. Let's hurry, or they might catch a cold.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Oh! You again!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Have you had lunch? There was a fire here, and you don't talk at all. You would've gotten burned, if it wasn't for us!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Keep your distance, Grain Buds! He might swing his axe at you.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: He won't. He calms down when I play my flute.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: He likes to hear me play.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: See? You all say not to come here, but I come all the time when no one's looking. I just can't cross the river.
attributes.name: Grain Buds
Grain Buds
attributes.content: He calms down when I play this tune. I've seen him smile.

attributes.name: Grain Buds
attributes.content: I can even lean over to touch his axe. He always keeps his hand clenched around it, but he's...
Ouch!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Why did you hit me? Now you've made me mad. I'm not bringing you any treats next time!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: That's enough, Grain Buds! Let's go!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: The foals...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: ...We'll bring them back.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Next time, think before you act.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: (What am I doing here?)
attributes.name: Zuo Le
